Title: ...And the Beast from the Sea
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Steve Lightfoot, Bryan Fuller
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: With a full moon approaching, Jack and Will are certain that Francis Dolarhyde will strike again but they lack a solid lead; Alana gives Hannibal a chance for redemption.
